name: Pawsitivity (JamieOutram)
description:
Chonk is out for a stroll but everyone's having a hard day. Can you help them bring joy back to the village?

Controls:

Movement - WASD,

Interact E,

Snake Minigame - Click and drag

Sheep Minigame - Click and drag

Beaver Minigame - Q and R to rotate, Mouse
